! Title: Dandelion Sprout's Disallowed Clients for AdGuard Home in Particular
! Version: 02September2020v2
! Expires: 7 days
! Description: This is a list of unusually strange and/or presumed hostile IP addresses that thought it'd be a good idea to port scan or otherwise mistreat my publicly accessible AdGuard Home server, without having anything even close to a good reason for doing so.
! Special thanks to https://tehnoblog.org/ip-tools/ip-address-aggregator/ for providing the internet with the one and only CIDR online compression tool currently known to exist.
! For more information, details, helpful tools, and other lists that I've made, visit https://github.com/DandelionSprout/adfilt/blob/master/Wiki/General-info.md#english

! After this list became grouped into company paragraphs, you can't import these entries in AGH with one simple copy-and-paste anymore, requiring some tricks with Sublime Text (or other RegEx-supporting text editors) each time, or pasting the entries one paragraph at a time.
! If you want a much simpler way to handle all these entries, please give thumbs-ups and hearts to https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardHome/issues/1032

! Acceptably good servers:
! • (Anything with 'Research' in their names.)
! • Arbor Observatory
! • Shodan
! • Onyphe
! • Censys (incl. any requests to c.afekv.com)
! • Cybergreen (incl. Amazon requests for it)
! • Hurricane Electric
! • Telnetscanproject
! • Stretchoid
! • Internet Assigned Numbers Authority
! • Grenode (by virtue of The Closed Resolver Project) 
! • Rethem (by virtue of InterneTTL)
! • Stichting Internet Domeinregistratie Nederland, a.k.a. SIDN Labs
! • "BinaryEdge.ninja"
! • Case Western Reserve University
! • Rapid7Labs
! • Zenlayer Inc (by virtue of "internet-census.org")

! Can't be easily tied to fraudulent activities:
! • Google LLC / Google User Content (Can't find info on their "api.version" DNS requests.)
! • DigitalOcean (Far too high chance that a request could be from a legitimate research group.)

! Unacceptably bad servers:
! • (Anything whatsoever from PR-China)
! • (Any datacenters from Russia)
! • (Any datacenters from Ukraine)
! • (Any datacenters from Romania)
! • (Any datacenters from The Netherlands, except for SIDN)
! • CARInet
! • Amazon AWS
! • Contabo
! • Bezeq International, a.k.a SE4-PTK, a.k.a. SE6-PTK
! • Highwinds Network Group
! • Poney Telecom
! • "UKservers.com"
! • IP Volume
! • BuyVM
! • Host4Fun
! • RebeccaHost
! • PrononetPL
! • Krypt Technologies
! • ICME Limited
! • Dedipath
! • OVH Hosting
! • Aceville Pte. Ltd., a.k.a. 16 Collier Quay
! • Oracle Public Cloud
! • ALPHAREL, a.k.a. optigraphics Corporation, a.k.a. Plus Analytics
! • XEMU, a.k.a. Estro Web Services
! • Global Frag Network
! • Piranha Systems
! • New Century InfoComm Tech. Co., Ltd.
! • Webtropia
! • Vultr + Choopa
! • MCI Communications Services
! • ICSI
! • MAXKO j.d.o.o.
! • Digital Energy Technologies Limited
! • AliBaba, a.k.a. AliCloud
! • Ahoura Telecommunication
! • AstroVM
! • PPTECHNOLOGY LIMITED
! • Forte Telecom
! • Kamatera, Inc.
! • PSINet, Inc.
! • ServerHub Los Angeles
! • GDNP LLC
! • Hydra Communications
! • FranTech Solutions
! • Linode (due to Hitnslab)
! • XSServer-GmbH-3
